description._content:
bDescription:/b Teacher Training in Hong Kong. The main entrance at Northcote Training College. Most students are Chinese, though Eurasians and Portuguese are also enrolled.

bLocation:/b Hong Kong

bDate:/b 1962

------------------------------------------------------

bOur Catalogue Reference:/b Part of CO 1069/478.

This image is part of the Colonial Office photographic collection held at The National Archives. Feel free to share it within the spirit of the Commons.

Please use the comments section below the pictures to share any information you have about the people, places or events shown. We have attempted to provide place information for the images automatically but our software may not have found the correct location.

For high quality reproductions of any item from our collection please contact our a href='http://www.nationalarchives.gov.uk/imagelibrary' rel='nofollow'image library/a
